EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2019.DC Update Email Snow
EmailTemplate.subject: Event Update!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Thank you for coming out to SpringOne Tour DC yesterday. The event will continue as planned today, doors will open at 8:00am.
We hope to see you there!
Thanks, Tasha Isenberg
